price: "Zar se čudiš Allahovoj odredbi?", rekoše oni, "Allahova milost i blagoslovi Njegovi neka su na vama, obitelji vjerovjesnička. Zaista je On hvaljen i slavljen!"
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَتَعۡجَبِينَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۖ رَحۡمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَٰتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٞ مَّجِيدٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū ataʿjabīna min amri al-lahi raḥmatu al-lahi wabarakātuhu ʿalaykum ahla al-bayti innahu ḥamīdun majīdun
